summary: Consume Orbit API to interact with activities, members, notes, and posts.

parameters.name: deprecated
parameters.description: Indicates that Orbit has been shutdown and will no longer function.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (Activity, Member, Note, Post).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource.

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: Select or specify the Workspace ID for the activity resource.

parameters.name: memberId
parameters.description: Specify the Member ID for creating an activity.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Specify the title of the activity to create.

parameters.name: additionalFields
parameters.description: Additional fields for creating an activity.
